formatted_address: 1 Marine Parade Central, #12-09 Parkway Centre, Singapore 449408
name: Mind Stretcher Learning Centre Marine Parade

reviews.text:
Dear Teacher Jay,I want to express my heartfelt gratitude for your invaluable support and guidance that you had provided me in my journey to achieve stellar results in English.

Your dedication, patience, and thoughtful teaching methods have truly made a difference. The way you broke down complex English principles, going through corrections with us, pinpoint each of our strengths and weaknesses in our worksheets and composition writing, providing extra study notes had helped me improved my understanding and use of  language skills,. My confidence in tackling challenges has also leveled up.

Thank you for believing in me and for going above and beyond to ensure my success. Your passion for teaching and genuine care have left a lasting impact on me, and I will always be grateful for your efforts.

Thank you Teacher Jaya.

My daughter went to Mindstretcher Marine Parade for P6 science. Teacher was Mrs Chandra Malar. She was very caring and attentive. Took extra focus to drill in concepts as well as answering techniques and was providing constant feedback and helping answer questions even via phone outside of lesson timing. Would really recommend her for students.

Mr. Shazli is truly an exceptional teacher and an incredible mentor to my child. Through Mr Shazli's guidance, my child has not only overcome her previous dislike of the subject but has also developed a deep appreciation for the wonders of science. I am truly grateful for his dedication and extra effort, especially in the analysis and feedback on her understanding of Science and areas to improve on. His commitment to my child’s success has made a significant difference! Wish there more were more dedicated teachers like him around!

Dear Mr Chee,
You are the best Science teacher I have met. Better then all my school teachers! Thanks to your teaching, my Science in school has improved a lot. You make learning very enjoyable for the whole class including me. I hope you can be my next year Science tuition teacher.
Yours sincerely,
Clive Koh P5 Science Saturday class

Dear Mr Shazli, we’d like to express our greatest appreciation to you for being my daughter’s P6 science tutor at MS Marine Parade. She has been really enjoying attending your classes and learning from you throughout the year. Your teaching has made learning science much easier and more fun. Your passion for teaching and how patient you are with parents also impressed us. Though my daughter has been your student for only 1 year, the impact you have brought to her science learning is profound. We thank you for being a great teacher and wish you all the best.
